scripts.prepare:exchange-lite: yarn prepare:exchange-lite-template & yarn prepare:exchange-lite-env & yarn prepare:blocks
scripts.prepare:exchange-lite:chapel: yarn prepare:exchange-lite-template:chapel & yarn prepare:exchange-lite-env:chapel & yarn prepare:blocks:chapel
scripts.deploy:blocks: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pnghai/strawberryswap-blocks subgraphs/blocks.yaml
scripts.deploy:blocks:chapel: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pnghai/stbe-blocks-chapel subgraphs/blocks.yaml

scripts.deploy:exchange: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pnghai/strawberryswap-exchange subgraphs/exchange.yaml
scripts.deploy:exchange-lite: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pnghai/strawberryswap-exchange-lite subgraphs/exchange-lite.yaml --debug
scripts.deploy:exchange-lite:chapel: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pnghai/stbe-ex-lite-chapel subgraphs/exchange-lite.yaml
scripts.deploy:profile: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pnghai/strawberryswap-profile subgraphs/profile.yaml
